document_data.name: Etsi Hashoto
document_data.mainbody: '''Etsi Hashoto''' was an inhabitant of the [[Fochu Peninsula]] in [[Wa]].
document_data.History: Yusuke lived in the village of [[Esan]] in the Fochu Peninsula and was a collector of butterflies. In [[1358 DR]], he was trying to identify an unusual specimen. Eventually, he asked the counsel of [[Osari Minhiro]] and a foreign adventuring party.
